validation.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
validation.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

permissions.noPermission: You don't have permission to access this page.

landing.tagline: Your personal travel companion. Track your journeys, discover new places, and create unforgettable memories.
landing.developmentStatus: 🚧 UNDER ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT - EARLY TESTING PHASE 🚧
landing.developmentDescription: Wayli is currently under active development and in an early testing phase. User registration is limited to specific people during this development period. This is a preview of what's coming!
landing.trackYourJourneyDescription: Record every location you visit with precise coordinates and timestamps.
landing.discoverTheWorldDescription: Explore new destinations and keep track of places you want to visit.
landing.analyzeYourTravelsDescription: Get insights into your travel patterns and statistics.
landing.joinOtherTravelers: Join other travelers who trust Wayli to track their journeys.
landing.selfHostedTagline: Self-hosted location tracking and trip management. Your data, your server, your privacy.
landing.privacyFirstDescription: Your data stays on your server. No third-party tracking or data sharing.
landing.automaticTripDescription: Set your home location and let Wayli automatically detect when you travel.
landing.beautifulAnalyticsDescription: Visualize your journeys with interactive maps and insightful statistics.
landing.multiUserDescription: Perfect for families or small teams. Admin controls included.
landing.readyToStart: Ready to start tracking your travels?
landing.createAccountToday: Create an account and begin documenting your journeys today.

auth.joinWayli: Join Wayli and start your journey
auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please enter your details to access your account.
auth.welcomeSetupProfile: Welcome! Let's set up your profile.
auth.enterPasswordForQR: Enter your password to generate a QR code for your authenticator app
auth.passwordRequirementsNotMet: Please ensure your password meets all requirements
auth.checkEmailMagicLink: Check your email for a magic link to sign in.
auth.checkEmailConfirmation: Check your email for a confirmation link to complete your registration.
auth.checkEmailConfirmationLink: Check your email for confirmation link
auth.registrationDisabledDescription: User registration is currently disabled by the system administrator.
auth.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent to your email
auth.failedToVerify2FA: Failed to verify 2FA status. Please try again.
auth.missingCredentials: Missing login credentials. Please sign in again.
auth.verifyIdentity: Please verify your identity to continue
auth.enterRecoveryCodeDescription: Enter one of your recovery codes to sign in
auth.enterCodeFromApp: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
auth.pleaseWaitSignIn: Please wait while we complete your sign in.
auth.secureAccountDescription: Secure your account with an authenticator app
auth.failedToGenerateQR: Failed to generate QR code. Please try again.
auth.scanQRCodeDescription: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
auth.storeCodesDescription: Store these codes in a safe place. They can be used to access your account if you lose your device.
auth.disable2FAWarning: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure. You'll only need your password to sign in.
auth.mustEnterPasswordToDisable: You must enter your password to disable two-factor authentication.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
auth.failedToSendPasswordReset: Failed to send password reset email
auth.checkEmailPasswordReset: Check your email for a password reset link.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully!
auth.verificationEmailSent: We've sent a verification email to your inbox
auth.checkInboxForEmail: Check your inbox for an email from Wayli
auth.clickVerificationLink: Click the verification link in the email
auth.youWillBeRedirected: You'll be automatically redirected and signed in
auth.checkSpamFolder: Check your spam folder or request a new verification email
auth.pleaseWaitBeforeResending: Please wait before requesting another email
auth.enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

signup.firstUserWelcome: Welcome! You're setting up Wayli for the first time.
signup.firstUserAdminInfo: As the first user, you'll automatically receive administrator privileges, allowing you to manage server settings and invite other users.

onboarding.welcomeMessage: Track your travels automatically and privately on your own server.
onboarding.welcomeSetupProfile: Welcome! Let's set up your profile.
onboarding.homeLocationHelp: Your home location is used to automatically generate trips when you travel away from home. Enter your full street address for precision, or just your city name for privacy.
onboarding.homeLocationOptional: This is completely optional—you can skip it and add it later in Account Settings.
onboarding.homeLocationTip: 💡 Used for automatic trip detection and generation from your location data
onboarding.confirmSkip: Are you sure you want to skip the setup?
onboarding.profileComplete: Welcome! Your profile is all set.
onboarding.canAddHomeAddressLater: You can add your home address anytime from Account Settings

statistics.noDataMessage: No location data found for the selected date range. Try adjusting your filters or check if you have any location data recorded.

connections.title: Connections
connections.owntracksDescription: Set up Wayli with OwnTracks by using the following API endpoint and key in your OwnTracks app.
connections.instruction1: Generate an API key using the button above
connections.instruction2: Copy the API endpoint and key
connections.instruction3: In your OwnTracks app, set the endpoint to the copied URL

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.importDescription: Import your travel data from various sources. Imports are processed in the background by workers and progress will be shown in the sidebar.
importExport.exportDescription: Export your travel data to various formats
importExport.importing: Uploading... (This may take a few minutes for large files)
importExport.pleaseSelectFile: Please select a file and format
importExport.pleaseSelectDates: Please select start and end dates
importExport.gpxDescription: GPS Exchange Format containing tracks, routes, and waypoints
importExport.ownTracksDescription: OwnTracks recording files (.REC) exported from the OwnTracks app

trips.title: Trips
trips.poweredByPexels: Powered by Pexels for high-quality trip images
trips.addLabelPlaceholder: Add a label (e.g., vacation, business, adventure)
trips.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
trips.usingServerApiKey: ✅ Using server API key for high-quality suggestions
trips.analyzesYourTravelData: Analyzes your travel data to suggest relevant images for this trip
trips.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or filters
trips.startCreatingFirstTrip: Start creating your first trip to see it here
trips.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {title}? This action cannot be undone.
trips.tripGenerationStartedForDateRange: Trip generation job started for {startDate} to {endDate}!
trips.tripGenerationStartedFromDate: Trip generation job started from {startDate} onwards!
trips.tripGenerationStartedAutomatic: Trip generation job started! The system will automatically find available date ranges and generate suggestions.
trips.failedToLoadMoreSuggestedTrips: Failed to load more suggested trips
trips.failedToGenerateNewTripSuggestions: Failed to generate new trip suggestions
trips.tripImageSuggestedSuccessfully: Trip image suggested based on your travel data!
trips.tripsApprovedWithImages: Trips approved successfully! {withImages}/{total} trips have images attached.
trips.startAndEndDatesRequired: Start and end dates are required.
trips.endDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date.
trips.failedToSuggestImage: Failed to suggest image. Please try uploading your own.
trips.noImageSuggestionAvailable: No image suggestion available for this date range.
trips.failedToUploadImageTryAgain: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
trips.requestTimedOut: Request timed out. Please try again.

tripDetection.autoGenerated: Trip detected from location patterns: {locationCount} location{plural} visited

generateSuggestions.pleaseAddHomeAddress: Please add your home address in your account settings first

tripGenerationModal.title: Generate trip suggestions
tripGenerationModal.tipDescription: If you lived at different addresses during the analysis period, consider setting specific start and end dates for each address to get more accurate trip detection.
tripGenerationModal.automaticDateRangeDescription: Leave empty to automatically find available date ranges
tripGenerationModal.datesOptionalDescription: Leave both dates empty to generate trip suggestions from all your available location data. Set specific dates to limit the analysis to a particular time period.
tripGenerationModal.singleDayTripError: Start and end dates cannot be the same. A trip must span at least two days.
tripGenerationModal.startDateMustBeBeforeEndDate: Start date must be before the end date.
tripGenerationModal.clearExistingSuggestions: Clear all existing suggestions before generating new ones
tripGenerationModal.useCustomHomeAddress: Use custom home address for this analysis
tripGenerationModal.clearSuggestionsWarning: This will permanently delete all your existing suggested trips and rejected suggestions before generating new ones. This action cannot be undone.

accountSettings.title: Account settings
accountSettings.profileDescription: Manage your personal information and account details
accountSettings.preferencesSubtitle: Configure your language, units, and display preferences
accountSettings.securityDescription: Manage your password and security preferences
accountSettings.emailCannotChange: Email address cannot be changed yet.
accountSettings.homeLocationContext: Used for automatic trip detection when you travel. You can enter your full street address or just your city.
accountSettings.tripDetectionHelp: This helps with automatic trip detection when you're away from home
accountSettings.canAddHomeAddressLater: You can add your home address later if you change your mind
accountSettings.twoFactorDisabled: Add an extra layer of security to your account
accountSettings.tripExclusionsDescription: Exclude cities from counting as 'away'. Visits to these cities will be treated as 'home' when detecting trips.
accountSettings.addTripExclusionsHint: Add cities you regularly visit (e.g., work city) that should not count as trips.
accountSettings.pexelsApiKeyDescription: Configure a Pexels API key to get better quality trip image suggestions based on your travel destinations. Without an API key, the system will use fallback image services.
accountSettings.getApiKey: Get your free API key here
accountSettings.apiKeyConfigured: ✅ API key configured - high-quality trip image suggestions enabled
accountSettings.noApiKey: ℹ️ No API key - trip image suggestions will use fallback services
accountSettings.failedToUpdateProfile: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
accountSettings.failedToUpdatePreferences: Failed to update preferences. Please try again.
accountSettings.passwordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters long
accountSettings.failedToUpdatePassword: Failed to update password. Please try again.
accountSettings.tripsDescription: Configure trip image suggestions and exclusion zones
accountSettings.tripImageSuggestionsDescription: Configure a Pexels API key to get high-quality trip image suggestions based on your travel destinations.
accountSettings.dontHavePexelsApiKey: Don't have a Pexels API key?
accountSettings.serverPexelsKeyConfigured: Server-level Pexels API key is configured
accountSettings.serverPexelsKeyDetails: A server-level API key is already configured. You can still provide your own personal API key below if preferred. Note: The default free Pexels API has a rate limit of 200 requests per hour.
accountSettings.usingPersonalApiKey: Using personal API key for trip image suggestions
accountSettings.usingServerApiKey: Using server-configured API key for trip image suggestions
accountSettings.noApiKeyConfigured: No API key configured - trip image suggestions will use fallback services
accountSettings.leaveEmptyToUseServerKey: Leave empty to use server key

serverAdmin.title: Server admin settings
serverAdmin.requireEmailVerificationDescription: Users must verify their email before accessing the system
serverAdmin.smtpNotConfigured: Email verification requires SMTP to be configured in your Supabase Auth settings
serverAdmin.emailVerificationConfiguredInSupabase: Email verification is controlled by Supabase Auth settings, not Wayli.
serverAdmin.changeEmailVerificationInstructions: To change this setting, update the Supabase Helm chart value 'supabase.auth.enableEmailAutoconfirm' and redeploy.
serverAdmin.manageUsersDescription: Manage users and their permissions. Total users:
serverAdmin.noUsersYet: No users have been created yet.
serverAdmin.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
serverAdmin.updateUserDescription: Update the user's details and role.
serverAdmin.adminEmailConfiguredInSupabase: Admin email is controlled by Supabase Auth settings, not Wayli.
serverAdmin.registrationConfiguredInSupabase: User registration is controlled by Supabase Auth settings, not Wayli.
serverAdmin.updateInValuesYaml: Update this in your Helm values.yaml file and redeploy
serverAdmin.setInAuthService: Set this environment variable in the auth service
serverAdmin.restartAfterChange: After making changes, restart your Supabase Auth service for them to take effect.
serverAdmin.supabaseAuthConfigDescription: These settings are controlled by Supabase Auth, not Wayli. Configure them in your Helm values or environment variables.
